abstract: Stocks fall sharply, led by slumping Apple.

headline.print_headline: Apple’s Slumping Shares Lead Market Lower
headline.main: Apple’s Slumping Shares Lead Market Lower

snippet: Apple pulled technology companies lower after Carl Icahn said he had sold his shares, and consumer companies also lost ground.
lead_paragraph: Apple pulled technology companies lower after Carl Icahn said he had sold his shares, and consumer companies also lost ground.
